title: keanuReeves17

content: Hello guys i am selling Facebook ads manager account verified with 5-10k daily spend limitAlso have available balance to spend on ads5k daily limit+ $500 available balance price $200 per account10k daily limit+ $800 available balance price $330 per accountREPLACEMENT POLICY*When your Account Suspended due billing we will call Facebook and verify Account, If account Fail to unsuspected we will Replace new one.Payment method: Skrill, Btc, Usdt.Contacts: Telegram: https://t.me/MatthewNorman1 @MatthewNorman1 ( FAST RESPONSE )

comments.author: fahlang1
